## Vectors

```{r}
l <- c(FALSE,FALSE,TRUE,FALSE)
n <- c(12.333,12.389,12.918,13,14.021)
cc <- c('programming','r','python')
```
```{r}
length(l)
class(l) 
length(n)
class(n)
length(cc)
class(cc)
```

## What if we mix types?

```{r}
m1 <- c('R','is','Easy',FALSE)
class(m1) 
m1
```
```{r}
m2 <- c(1,2,3,123.123)
class(m2)
m2
```
```{r}
m3 <- c('programming',3000,'lines')
class(m3)
m3
```
```{r}
m4 <- c(-2,-1,FALSE,TRUE,2)
class(m4)
m4
```
